title: Nonlinear System Control Design and Simulation Practice

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational control theory and linear systems understanding, with basic MATLAB/Simulink proficiency
context.additional_context: Parallel practical sessions using digital devices (tablets/laptops), structured with 1:1 ratio of theoretical explanations and simulation practices

learning_goals: Explain stability analysis and control techniques for nonlinear systems
Demonstrate the state constraint design process utilizing Barrier Lyapunov Function
Implement an Adaptive Neural Network controller in MATLAB/Simulink environment to verify system responses
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
